Module ‘’animal’‘¶

This code will contain the island class

class biosim.animal.Animal[source]¶

Class for animal functions

static aging(pos, animals)[source]¶

Ages all the animals on one tile with 1 year.

Parameters:
  • pos – The position/tile
  • animals – The animal dictionary
breeding(pos, island_class, animals)[source]¶

Breeds animals on the given position for the given species.

Parameters:
  • pos – The position/tile
  • island_class – The island-class, used to add animals
  • animals – the dictionary contain info about all the selected species
Returns:
calculate_fitness(pos, animals)[source]¶

Calculates the fitness for all the animals on one tile.

Parameters:
  • pos – Gives the position were we want to calculate the fitness
  • animals – The animal dictionary for the given species
death(pos, animals)[source]¶

Removes from the animals list according to the formula for death :param pos: the position asked for :param animals: animal-dictionary

loss_of_weight(pos, animals)[source]¶

Reduces the weight of all the animals on a single tile

Parameters:
  • pos – The position/tile
  • animals – The animal dictionary
static sort_by_fitness(pos, animals)[source]¶

Sorts the animals after their fitness, best to worst.

Parameters:
  • pos – the position(tile)
  • animals – the animal dictionary
class biosim.animal.Carnivores(w_birth=6.0, sigma_birth=1.0, beta=0.75, eta=0.125, a_half=60.0, phi_age=0.4, w_half=4.0, phi_weight=0.4, mu=0.4, lambda1=1.0, gamma=0.8, zeta=3.5, xi=1.1, omega=0.9, f=50.0, deltaphimax=10.0)[source]¶

The class containing all the necessary functions for herbivores :param w_birth: The average weight for a newborn Herbivore :param sigma_birth: The standard deviation for a newborn :param beta: The growing factor telling how much of the food is changed into weight :param eta: The weight reduction factor :param a_half: Fitness-factor :param phi_age: Fitness-factor :param w_half: Fitness-factor :param phi_weight: Fitness-factor :param mu: Probability for moving :param lambda1: Migration-factor :param gamma: gives the probability for giving birth, given number of animals on same tiles and their fitness :param zeta: Gives the restrictions for giving girth depending on weight :param xi: The factor for weight loss after given birth :param omega: The probability of dying given the animals fitness-value :param f: The maximum value that the carnivores eat :param deltaphimax: Constant used to calculate if the carnivore eats the herbivore

carnivores_eat(pos, island_class, animals)[source]¶

Function for the carnivores to eat.

Parameters:
  • pos – Position for which the animals shall eat
  • island_class – The Island-class, used to import the herbivores
  • animals – The carnivore dictionary

migration_calculations(island_class, herb_class, animals)[source]¶

Calculates which animals shall move and where they shall move to, makes one list with animals that will be placed into new positions in the migration_execution-function and one list with animals that are deleted in the migration_execution-function. :param island_class: The Island-class used to check terrain-type and total weight of the herbivores

in the neighbour tiles
Parameters:
  • herb_class – The Herbivore-class imported to use calculate total weight of the herbivores
  • animals – The carnivore dictionary
migration_execution(island_class, animals)[source]¶

Function that executes what is being calculated in the migration_calculations-functions, removes the animals that are migrating from their current positions and places them in their new position.

Parameters:
  • island_class – The Island-class used to add animals to new positions
  • animals – The carnivore dictionary
set_new_params(new_params)[source]¶

Set class parameters. Parameters ———- new_params : dict

Legal keys: ‘w_birth’, ‘sigma_birth’, ‘beta’, ‘eta’, ‘a_half’, ‘phi_age’, ‘w_half’, ‘phi_weight’, ‘mu’,
‘lambda’, ‘gamma’, ‘zeta’, ‘xi’, ‘omega’, ‘F’

ValueError, KeyError

static sort_by_fitness(pos, animals)¶

Sorts the animals after their fitness, best to worst.

Parameters:
  • pos – the position(tile)
  • animals – the animal dictionary
class biosim.animal.Herbivores(w_birth=8.0, sigma_birth=1.5, beta=0.9, eta=0.05, a_half=40.0, phi_age=0.2, w_half=10.0, phi_weight=0.1, mu=0.25, lambda1=1.0, gamma=0.2, zeta=3.5, xi=1.2, omega=0.4, f=10.0)[source]¶

The animal subclass for Herbivores

The class containing all the necessary functions for herbivores.

Parameters:
  • w_birth – The average weight for a newborn Herbivore
  • sigma_birth – The standard deviation for weight of a newborn
  • beta – The growing factor telling how much of the food is changed into weight
  • eta – The weight reduction factor
  • a_half – Fitness-factor
  • phi_age – Fitness-factor
  • w_half – Fitness-factor
  • phi_weight – Fitness-factor
  • mu – Factor used to calculate probability for migration
  • lambda1 – Migration-factor
  • gamma – Gives the probability for giving birth, given number of animals on same tiles and their fitness
  • zeta – Gives the restrictions for giving girth depending on weight
  • xi – The factor for weight loss after given birth
  • omega – The probability of dieing given the animals fitnessvalue
static aging(pos, animals)¶

Ages all the animals on one tile with 1 year.

Parameters:
  • pos – The position/tile
  • animals – The animal dictionary
animals_eat(pos, island_class, animals)[source]¶

Herbivores eat, in order of their fitness.

Parameters:
  • pos – The position/tile
  • island_class – Retrives the Island-class, to make use of the food_gets_eat function
  • animals – The herbivore dictionary

migration_calculations(island_class, animals)[source]¶

Calculates which animals shall move and where they shall move to, makes one list with animals that will be placed into new positions in the migration_execution-function and one list with animals that are deleted in the migration_execution-function.

Parameters:
  • island_class – The Island-class used to check terrain-type and amount of food in the neighbour tiles
  • animals – The herbivore dictionary
migration_execution(island_class, animals)[source]¶

Function that executes what is being calculated in the migration_calculations-functions, removes the animals that are migrating from their current positions and places them in their new position.

Parameters:
  • island_class – The Island-class used to add animals to new positions
  • animals – The herbivore dictionary
set_new_params(new_params)[source]¶

Set class parameters. Parameters ———- new_params : dict

Legal keys: ‘w_birth’, ‘sigma_birth’, ‘beta’, ‘eta’, ‘a_half’, ‘phi_age’, ‘w_half’, ‘phi_weight’, ‘mu’,
‘lambda’, ‘gamma’, ‘zeta’, ‘xi’, ‘omega’, ‘F’

ValueError, KeyError

static sort_before_getting_hunted(pos, animals)[source]¶

Sorts the herbivores from worst to best fitness.

Parameters:
  • pos – The position to sort the animals
  • animals – The animal dictionary that shall be sorted
static sort_by_fitness(pos, animals)¶

Sorts the animals after their fitness, best to worst.

Parameters:
  • pos – the position(tile)
  • animals – the animal dictionary
static tot_weight_herbivores(pos, animals)[source]¶

Function to calculate the total weight of the herbivores, it is used in the carnivore migration_calculation- function.

Parameters:
  • pos – The position for which we calculate the total weight
  • animals – The animal dictionary, in this case the dictionary for herbivores
